answers.answer: Define  bad?Every time your BG goes over 140 you are doing damage to your body.  it adds up over time, if your 75 yo  by the time the damage adds up youle be 90 or so, so what. if your 25  thats a different matter.As a verry smart guy on another forum said " There is no food I like better than my eye sight"
No, as long as you can keep your blood sugars within limits.

question: Is it bad for me to do a diabetes meal plan during the week but splurge on the weekend?
title: Is it bad?
